1679610.name: RPG Maker MV - The Japan Collection - Backgrounds
1679610.description:
Take a stroll through modern rural and urban Japan with these retro pixel-art illustrations.

Perfect for use in Visual Novel Maker or for the title screen/cut scenes in your project. These illustrations will take you from Osaka to Tokyo with plenty of rural stops along the way.

This pack contains:

- 13 animated and static retro pixel-art illustrations with a day time theme at the following resolutions:

4000x4000
2000x2000
1920x1080
1280x720

- 2 animated and static retro pixel-art illustrations with a night time theme at the following resolutions:

4000x2000
2000x1000
1920x1080
1280x720

- File formats include PNG, GIF, MP4, WEBM.

- Battleback crops of the illustrations for use in RPGMaker VXAce and RPGMaker MV/MZ.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1679610.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
